com.precog.client.rest

Class Rest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.precog.client.rest.Rest

  • public class Rest
extends Object
    Class to represent a RESTful service and execute Requests against it.
    Author:
    Gabriel Claramunt , Tom Switzer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rest(URL service)
      Creates a Rest instance that uses service as its end-point for all requests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response execute(Request request)
      Executes a REST Request against this HTTP end-point and returns the Response.
      static Response execute(URL service, Request request)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rest

        public Rest(URL service)
        Creates a Rest instance that uses service as its end-point for all requests.

        service - the end-point to use for requests

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public static Response execute(URL service,
               Request request)
                        throws HttpException
        Throws:
        HttpException

      • execute

        public Response execute(Request request)
                 throws HttpException
        Executes a REST Request against this HTTP end-point and returns the Response.
        Parameters:
        request - the REST request
        Returns:
        the server's response
        Throws:
        HttpException - if a network error occurs while executing the REST request
        IllegalArgumentException - if HTTPS is required, but the end-point is HTTP.
